Uses of Class
Steganography.Exceptions.CannotDecodeException

  • Packages that use CannotDecodeException 
    Package Description
    Steganography.Logic
    The Steganography.Logic package contains all the classes used to handle the steganography, encryption and compression processes (and more...) in the Steganography package.

    • Uses of CannotDecodeException in Steganography.Logic

      Methods in Steganography.Logic that throw CannotDecodeException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      abstract void BaseSteganography.decode​(java.io.File file)
      Decodes the content of a stego image and saves it to a file.
      void GifSteganography.decode​(java.io.File file)
      Extracts the header from the stego image to create the BaseSteganography.secretInfo field, then decodes the hidden data in the image using GifSteganography.revealByte(), then saves the secret file.
      void ImageInImageSteganography.decode​(java.io.File result)
      Extracts the header from the stego image to create the BaseSteganography.secretInfo field, then decodes the hidden image using ImageInImageSteganography.revealPixel(int), then saves the secret image.
      void ImageSteganography.decode​(java.io.File file)
      Extracts the header from the stego image to create the BaseSteganography.secretInfo field, then decodes the hidden data in the image using ImageSteganography.revealByte(int, int, byte), then saves the secret file.
      abstract byte[] BaseSteganography.getHeader​()
      Returns the header containing information about the embedded data from a stego image.
      byte[] GifSteganography.getHeader​()
      Returns the header that contains information about the data embedded in the stego image.
      byte[] ImageSteganography.getHeader​()
      Returns the header that contains information about the data embedded in the stego image.
